timeline.bodyText:
This could be coded like this:
return status.getCoding().stream().filter(c -> FhirConstants.ALLERGY_INTOLERANCE_CLINICAL_STATUS_VALUE_SET.equals(c.getSystem())).anyMatch(c -> "inactive".equals(c.getCode()))
